trans-unit.source: Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a nonland card, then put all cards revealed this way into your hand.
trans-unit.target: Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a nonland card, then put all cards revealed this way into your hand.

trans-unit.source: "Some call me a thief. I prefer to think of myself as a discreet borrower."\n—Dack Fayden, Planeswalker

trans-unit.source: Cast this spell only if you control two or more Vampires. Destroy target creature. You gain 4 life.
trans-unit.target: Cast this spell only if you control two or more Vampires. Destroy target creature. You gain 4 life.

trans-unit.resname: PIDW·4 | Feast of Blood | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Imbued in the Ancient Fang were spells far darker than any Dack Fayden would cast.
trans-unit.target: Imbued in the Ancient Fang were spells far darker than any Dack Fayden would cast.

trans-unit.target: Electrolyze

trans-unit.target: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated.

trans-unit.source: Fayden didn't know if the giant had created the spehere's magic—only that he had to escape it to find Sifa.
trans-unit.target: Fayden didn't know if the giant had created the spehere's magic—only that he had to escape it to find Sifa.

trans-unit.target: Spend only black mana on X. Consume Spirit deals X damage to any target and you gain X life.

trans-unit.source: "Youth is wasted on the young. So I help myself to some of it from time to time."\n—Sifa Grent

trans-unit.source: Standstill
trans-unit.target: Standstill

trans-unit.source: When a player casts a spell, sacrifice Standstill. If you do, each of that player's opponents draws three cards.
trans-unit.target: When a player casts a spell, sacrifice Standstill. If you do, each of that player's opponents draws three cards.

trans-unit.source: "You learn a lot in no time when you're about to get your neck snapped."\n—Dack Fayden
trans-unit.target: "You learn a lot in no time when you're about to get your neck snapped."\n—Dack Fayden

trans-unit.source: The draconic demon loomed over Dack, and he suddenly sensed he wasn't the only Planeswalker that Malfegor had encountered.

trans-unit.target: Choose artifact, creature, or land. Tap all untapped permanents of the chosen type target player controls, or untap all tapped permanents of that type that player controls.

trans-unit.source: Voidmage Husher
trans-unit.target: Voidmage Husher

trans-unit.source: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) When Voidmage Husher enters the battlefield, counter target activated ability. (Mana abilities can't be targeted.) Whenever you cast a spell, you may return Voidmage Husher to its owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) When Voidmage Husher enters the battlefield, counter target activated ability. (Mana abilities can't be targeted.) Whenever you cast a spell, you may return Voidmage Husher to its owner's hand.

trans-unit.source: "There's nothing like the high seas to clear your head or escape pursuers."
